title: Which famous museum in Paris houses the Mona Lisa?
description: Identify the renowned Parisian museum that is home to the Mona Lisa.

title: Which of these French authors wrote 'Les Misérables'?
description: Select the author of the famous French novel 'Les Misérables'.

title: Name three famous French authors.
description: Enter the names of three renowned French authors.

title: Which of these are traditional French dishes?
description: Select all the dishes that are traditionally French.

title: What is the name of the famous French cycling race?
description: Choose the correct name of the renowned French multi-stage bicycle race.

title: In which year did the French national football team win their first FIFA World Cup?
description: Enter the year when France first won the FIFA World Cup.

title: Which of these are French car manufacturers?
description: Select all the car brands that are of French origin.

title: What is the name of the famous French high-speed rail service?
description: Choose the correct name of France's high-speed train network.

title: What does 'TGV' stand for?
description: Enter the full name that the acronym TGV represents in French.

title: Which French city is famous for its annual film festival?
description: Select the French city known for hosting a prestigious international film festival.

title: Which of these French scientists discovered radioactivity?
description: Identify the French scientist who discovered radioactivity.

title: What elements did Marie Curie discover?
description: Select all the elements discovered by Marie Curie.

title: In which year did Marie Curie win her first Nobel Prize?
description: Enter the year when Marie Curie was awarded her first Nobel Prize.

title: Which famous French fashion designer founded the 'House of Chanel'?
description: Select the name of the designer who established the iconic Chanel brand.

title: Which of these are famous French luxury brands?
description: Select all the luxury brands that are of French origin.

title: In which year was the French luxury brand Louis Vuitton founded?
description: Enter the year when Louis Vuitton established his company.

title: Which French king was known as the 'Sun King'?
description: Identify the French monarch who was famously called the 'Sun King'.

title: Which of these palaces were built or significantly expanded by Louis XIV?
description: Select all the palaces that Louis XIV had a major role in constructing or expanding.

title: How long did Louis XIV reign as King of France?
description: Enter the number of years Louis XIV ruled France (in the format 'XX years').

title: Which famous French military and political leader was exiled to the island of Saint Helena?
description: Select the name of the French leader who was exiled to Saint Helena after his defeat.
